alert.note: Alert for York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 10:32PM CDT until April 18 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR EASTERN YORK COUNTY... At 1032 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near York to 7 miles south of Waco, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Waco around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 357 and 365. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
